thread.title: 1,300-pound show horse slaughtered on Florida farm

title: 1,300-pound show horse slaughtered on Florida farm
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
A 1,300-pound show horse was slaughtered on a ranch by a mystery butcher who detectives believe targeted the massive animal to sell its meat... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
